      • waitForClusterHealth

        public static org.elasticsearch.action.admin.cluster.health.ClusterHealthResponse waitForClusterHealth(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client,
                                                                                                       org.elasticsearch.cluster.health.ClusterHealthStatus status,
                                                                                                       org.elasticsearch.common.unit.TimeValue timeValue)
        Waits for the cluster to have a given status, timeout after given timeout period.
        Parameters:
        client - Client connected to the required cluster.
        status - ClusterHealthStatus to wait for.
        timeValue - Period to wait for cluster health green.
        Returns:
        ClusterHealthResponse the response of the cluster health request.

      • refreshIndex

        public static void refreshIndex(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client,
                                java.lang.String indexName)
        Refreshes a named index after operations have been performed to modify it.
        Parameters:
        client - The client which holds a connection to the required index.
        indexName - The name of the index to refresh.
